CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Treatment Recommended stage positioned above or below the Diagnosis Confirmed stage?
SRP.A: The Treatment Recommended stage is positioned {below} the Diagnosis Confirmed stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Recommended?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Recommended is {739}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initial Consultation?
VE.A: The value of stage Initial Consultation is {3410}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Consultation, with a value of {3410}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Treatment Recommended, with a value of {739}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initial Consultation to stage Diagnostic Testing?
SC.A: Decreased by {1636} Patients from stage Initial Consultation to stage Diagnostic Testing.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to stage Treatment Recommended?
SC.A: Decreased by {173} Patients from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to stage Treatment Recommended.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
SC.A: Decreased by {862} Patients from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2592? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 825? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 825 and 2592? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Diagnostic Testing} stage has {1774}, the {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {912}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended, or from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to {Diagnostic Testing} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, or from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to {Diagnostic Testing} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended, from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, or from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to stage {Diagnostic Testing} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initial Consultation} and {Diagnostic Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Diagnosis Confirmed} and {Treatment Recommended} stages.
